summary: The story of three pets, a cat and two dogs, who lose their owners when they are all on vacation. Can they find their way home?
cast: Émile Genest|John Drainie|Tommy Tweed|Sandra Scott|Syme Jago|Marion Finlayson|Ronald Cohoon|Robert Christie|Beth Lockerbie|Jan Rubes|Iréna Mayeska|Beth Amos|Eric Clavering|Rex Allen|Syn Cat|Muffy|Rink
title: El viaje increíble
